blackjack.title: Blackjack
blackjack.rule1: Get as close to 21 without going over
blackjack.rule2: Face cards are worth 10, Aces are 1 or 11
blackjack.rule3: Dealer must hit on 16 or less, stand on 17 or more
blackjack.rule5: Double: Double your bet and get one more card

work.title: Work
work.description: Earn virtual money by working for 3 minutes
work.educationalMessage: ‚ö†Ô∏è Remember: In real life, earning money requires much more time and effort. Gambling is entertainment with a high risk of losses.
work.step1: Click the "Work" button when your balance is low
work.step2: Wait for 3 minutes while the timer counts down
work.step3: Receive $500 after completing the work session
work.educationalText: This work system demonstrates the value of time and money. In real life, earning money takes significant time and effort. The casino games show how quickly you can lose what you worked hard to earn.

about.title: ‚ÑπÔ∏è About Freezino Project
about.subtitle: Educational simulator to combat gambling addiction

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Combat gambling addiction
mission.description: Freezino is not an ordinary casino. It's an educational project created to demonstrate the real dangers of gambling in a safe environment. We use only virtual currency so players can experience firsthand how easy it is to lose money in a casino, without risking real funds.

step1.title: Virtual Money
step1.description: You start with a virtual balance of 1000 pseudo-dollars. Real money is NEVER used.

step2.title: Casino Games
step2.description: Play roulette, slots, blackjack and other classic games. All games work with realistic mechanics to show real winning odds.

step3.title: Work System
step3.description: Out of money? Work 3 minutes to earn $500. This simulates the time required to earn money in real life.

step4.title: Statistics & Analysis
step4.description: See your statistics and compare how much time it would take to earn the same amount at a real job in different countries.

f1.title: üé∞ Realistic Games
f1.description: All games work with real casino mathematics and probabilities

f2.title: üí∞ Virtual Currency
f2.description: No risk of losing real money - only educational demonstration

f3.title: ‚è∞ Work System
f3.description: Demonstrates the value of time and labor versus gambling losses

f4.title: üìä Statistics
f4.description: Detailed analytics of your sessions and comparisons with real salaries

f5.title: üåç International Comparison
f5.description: Compare your "earnings" with hourly wages in different countries

f6.title: üéì Educational
f6.description: Learn about gambling problems without financial risk

warning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Disclaimer
warning.text: Freezino is an educational project. We do not encourage gambling with real money. If you or someone you know has a gambling problem, please seek professional help.
warning.r1: The house always wins in the long run
warning.r2: Gambling is not a way to earn money
warning.r3: Never bet money you cannot afford to lose
warning.r4: Gambling should only be entertainment, not a source of income

consent.title: Cookie Settings
consent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience. Essential cookies are needed for site functionality (authentication, settings). Analytics cookies help us understand how you use the site.

settings.title: Cookie Settings
settings.description: Manage cookie settings for your Freezino experience. Essential cookies are always enabled as they are necessary for the site to function.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for basic site functionality, including authentication, language settings, and saving your cookie preferences. They cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use the site to improve your experience. Statistics are collected anonymously and used only for analytics.
